This episode is brought to you by Hawthorne (Go to http://hawthorne.co and use code CAST to get 10% off your purchase), Quip (Just go to http://getquip.com/cast to save on gift sets and to get your first refill FREE with a refill plan) and Bespoke Post (Get 20% off your first monthly box when you sign up at http://boxofawesome.com and enter code battlecast at checkout.) This episode aired December 17, 2019.
attributes.display_title: 2019:E176 - Q&A All Might VS Might Guy! - #158
